name: TilbudsFinder.dk
shortIntro: Find the best deals on grocer products
description: Tilbudsfinder is a passion project of mine, initially created to minimize the amount of time spent looking through grocer papers. It's a web application built with C# and .NET that aggregates and displays current grocery store discounts. Utilizing a robust API for seamless data integration and is deployed on a Linux VPS, ensuring reliable and scalable performance. The project is designed to provide users with a streamlined way to find and compare deals, making grocery shopping more cost-efficient and convenient.

name: FluxETL
description: FluxETL is a configuration-based data integration solution developed in collaboration with ECG, built using .NET 8, Apache Kafka, and Vue.js. The platform enables non-technical users to design and manage ETL pipelines through an intuitive no-code interface with drag-and-drop functionality. Its event-driven microservice architecture ensures high scalability, asynchronous processing, and robust error handling via dead-letter queues. Fully containerized for deployment with Kubernetes, FluxETL supports diverse data sources and destinations, and is designed for seamless integration into ECG's Enterprise Automation Platform.
